Hi, Curious!

Congratulations on completing "Canvas 101: The Philosophy"!
We enjoyed having you participate in our workshop.

If you have a few moments, please let us know how we did.  Your feedback
is valuable to us, and helps us to improve our workshops to keep providing
the highest quality.  Below is a link to an evaluation survey, and it will
only take a few moments of your time.

http://jmu.co1.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_82MNygLpNathnG5&course=Canvas+101%3A+The+Philosophy&enrollment_id=428823752&instructor=Professor+Wiseman

Thanks again, and we hope you enjoyed your workshop.  You can always find
our latest workshops and other events at https://cit.jmu.edu/workshops.
